title: Cheesy chicken pasta bake
ingredients: ['450g dry fusilli pasta', '450g skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces', '500ml vegetable oil for frying', '250g plain flour', '4 eggs, beaten', '250g Italian seasoned breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons garlic granules', '450g mozzarella cheese, grated and divided', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated', '1.35kg tomato pasta sauce', '125ml dry red wine', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated']
